text: when people first sort of get the idea
of ebpf one of their first questions is
wait a minute this is all powerful is it
safe and you know the the verifier that
Thomas has been talking about is a huge

users need to treat it with the same
respect that they treat root privileges
it is all powerful and you know so is
root and that's why we are very careful
about who we allow to have root access

to be running don't download an ebtf
